titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2905) to prevent the Federal Communications Commission from repromulgating the fairness doctrine.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2905) to prevent the Federal Communications Commission from repromulgating the fairness doctrine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Pence. Petition No: 110-3.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2905 (Broadcaster Freedom Act of 2007).
